Articles.Content: I‘m in an orbit and want to throttle up my engine but it won’t work.  So I look for a way to solve it but I only get answers for what to do with a keyboard. And now i’m stuck in orbit not able to throttle up my engine! so how do i throttle up with a controller??

On 2/4/2024 at 6:43 PM, Fubi said:

I‘m in an orbit and want to throttle up my engine but it won’t work.  So I look for a way to solve it but I only get answers for what to do with a keyboard. And now i’m stuck in orbit not able to throttle up my engine! so how do i throttle up with a controller??

there are many possible reasons why you can't throttle. maybe it's a probe and you lost control for a variety of reasons?

Are you playing in a console? If so you can find the control schemes for KSP in console Here for xbox and Here fo PS4

If you are playing in a PC go to main menu > Settings > Input  to see and adjust your controls

 

Notice you may be unable to throttle because lack of craft control or some technical issue with your controller.
